sources.title: 16 Wishes 2010 Dvdrip Xvid( PG)
sources.description: Abby's made a 16 wishes list for her 16th birthday. She gets 16 magic candles - 1 wish per hour. Things are fine in the beginning.

metadata.Plot: A 16 year old girl prepares a list of 16 wishes for 8 years, hoping they will come true on her 16th birthday. A fairy comes to give her 16 candles that make the 16 wishes come true. Her wishes go the wrong way and are permanent when midnight comes. She has one final wish to reverse her previous wishes.
metadata.Actors: Debby Ryan, Jean-Luc Bilodeau, Anna Mae Wills
